caption.p: Viral RNA load in clinical specimens. A, H5N1 RNA levels in admission NS and TS. B, Comparison of H5N1 RNA levels in NS and TS of F and S cases. H5N1 RNA levels in LRT, GIT, and blood specimens. Median value and interquartile range are depicted in red. Abbreviations: F, fatal; GIT, gastrointestinal tract; LRT, lower respiratory tract; NS, nasal swabs; S, surviving; TS, throat swabs. * P < .05; ** P < .005.
